alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 12:21AM CDT until August 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BENTON AND SOUTHWESTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 1221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morgan Creek Park, or near Cedar Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Hiawatha, Robins, Fairfax, Atkins, Walford, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Toddville, Morgan Creek Park and Pleasant Creek State Recreation Area. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
